Articles.Content: Make a spacewalk around Earth (on a fifty foot tether, floating free from a small capsule over the Earth) or walk on the Moon?
What about walk on the moon, then bounce myself into an orbit around the moon?
Walk on the moon.
Walk on the Moon. But, What if we had a 50 foot tether on board? Then, I would do a spacewalk in orbit around the Moon and then walk on it .
would you rather sit next to a brony that says nothing but mlp and ponysexualism(WHY DOES THAT EXIST) or a furry?

The furry, obviously. They don\'t necessarily flaunt their fandom, nor are they inquisitive.

Would you rather be shot in the foot or take an arrow to the knee?

arrow in the knee, kneecaps provide protection while feeet have none

would you rather kill bieber or rebecca black?
Bieber.

The furry, obviously. They don\'t necessarily flaunt their fandom, nor are they inquisitive.

Would you rather crash on the Mun or be stuck on Minmus?

Stuck on minmus. Playing in ice is fun!

Would you rather be tortured by Chinese Water Torture, or have someone tie you to the ground and make a bamboo shoot grow through your abdomen over several days?

(Yes, it can be done. Look up MythBusters; they\'ve proven it is possible).

Minecraft. Roblox sucks.

Would you rather crash on the Mun or be stuck on Minmus?

Definitely stuck on Minmus. At least I\'d have time to enjoy the scenery and hop around in really low gravity then be panicking as I\'m tumbling to the Munar surface.
I like how this somehow got confused for a game thread. LOL. I guess that\'s how it will stay.

Minecraft. Roblox sucks.

Would you rather crash on the Mun or be stuck on Minmus?

Minmus. It\'s so beautiful! (Also, when EVAs are implemented, I can just get into another craft.)
